validation.promptRequired: You must provide assignment text or upload assignment files
validation.rubricRequired: You must provide rubric text or upload rubric files

prompt.title: Assignment Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe here the complete assignment that students must complete...
prompt.note: * Required if no assignment files are uploaded
prompt.filesDescription: As an alternative or complement to the assignment text

rubric.title: Evaluation Rubric
rubric.placeholder: Define here the evaluation criteria, grading scales, and what aspects to consider for each grade...
rubric.note: * Required if no rubric files are uploaded
rubric.filesDescription: As an alternative or complement to the rubric text

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your OpenAI API and preferences

openai.title: OpenAI (External)
openai.description: Requires API Key. More powerful models.

local.title: Local Model
local.description: No API Key needed. Runs in your browser.

info.title: Locally executed model
info.description: The model is downloaded and runs directly in your browser. No data is sent to external servers.

modelManagement.title: Downloaded Model Management
modelManagement.clearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all model data? This will remove all states and downloads.
modelManagement.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the model {modelName}?
modelManagement.confirmReset: Do you want to reset the status of model {modelName}?

customPrompts.title: Custom Prompts
customPrompts.globalInfo: You are currently using the system global prompts. Enable custom prompts to create your own configuration.
customPrompts.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore prompts to global configuration? This will overwrite your custom prompts.
customPrompts.loadGlobalConfirm: Do you want to load global prompts as base for your custom configuration?

systemPrompt.title: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Define the main behavior of the AI evaluator

evaluationPrefix.title: Evaluation Prefix
evaluationPrefix.description: Text added at the beginning of each evaluation

students.title: Students
students.subtitle: Manage students for this evaluation
students.uploadInstructions: Click to upload files or drag and drop
students.filesRequired: At least one file must be uploaded

noStudents.title: No students
noStudents.description: Start by adding students to this evaluation.

students.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this student? Their result will also be deleted if it exists.
students.allEvaluated: All students have already been evaluated.
students.batchEvaluationComplete: Batch evaluation completed. Review the results.

fileView.title: View content of {fileName}
fileView.noContent: No content available for this file.
fileView.binaryFile: This file is binary and cannot be displayed as text.

modelDownload.downloadPrompt: Do you want to download it now? (Size: {size})
modelDownload.downloadNote: Note: Download may take several minutes depending on your connection.
modelDownload.initializingBatch: Initializing local model for batch evaluation...
modelDownload.modelReady: Model loaded and ready to use

reports.title: PDF Report Generation
reports.description: Download professional reports with tables and styles
reports.noEvaluated: This student has not been evaluated yet.
reports.noResults: No evaluated students to generate the report.

gpt35.description: Fast and efficient model for general tasks

gpt4.description: More powerful model for complex tasks

errors.cannotConvertObject: Cannot convert undefined or null to object
errors.browserOnly: This operation can only be performed in the browser

fileUpload.instruction: Click to upload files or drag and drop
